item.title: How to Safely Access the Dark Web and Gather Information Securely
item.description: This guide provides essential tips on how to safely access the dark web and gather information while ensuring privacy and security

item.title: Malicious Document Analysis Walkthrough
item.description: This walkthrough guides you through the analysis of malicious documents using various tools and techniques.

item.title: Firewall Fundamentals
item.description: Explore and master the Linux iptables firewall and its utilities for managing network traffic and enhancing security on Linux systems.

item.title: Legal Considerations in DFIR
item.description: Understand the processes involved in DFIR and the legal considerations that guide them.

item.title: Networking Concepts
item.description: Learn about the ISO OSI model and the TCP/IP protocol suite.

item.title: SOC Fundamentals
item.description: Learn about the SOC team and their processes.

item.title: Day 1 - Introduction to Packet Tracer
item.description: Overview of Cisco Packet Tracer and setting up a basic DHCP example

item.title: IR Playbooks
item.description: Learn the basics of creating and using IR playbooks.

item.title: Forensic Imaging
item.description: Learn the basic concepts of forensic imaging.
